title: Uno Card Game
short_description: The classic card game of matching colours and numbers Special Action Cards and Wild Cards for unexpected excitement and game-changing fun Use the Swap Hands cards to change hands with any other opponent Write your own rules for game play with the Wild Customizable cards Players take turns matching a card in their hand with the current colour or number card shown on the top of the deck Don’t forget to shout UNO when you only have one card remaining Hands-on play for early childhood development  See more product details
